page.title: 16LIFE STYLES
page.content: My hobby is playing the flute and piano.I have one lesson a week on each instrument.I play in a flute quartet which is held at the Brighton Music Centre.I am also a member of the Brighton Junior Orchestra which is held at the Brighton Polytecnic.I often get together with my friend who also plays the flute and we play duets.Sometimes I play the piano and she plays her flute. Gymnastics is a very good thing because it exercises all our body.Where I go to gymnastics first of all we do some exercises then we get on with practising for our British Amateur Gymnastic Association badges.
